info.name: Simple Rounded - FireFox
info.description: A very minimal and cozy theme.
info.additionalInfo:
This theme works best with the Gotham Rounded font. You can either pay for it or find somewhere online where it's free. This theme also is geared towards people who are familiar with the FireFox keyboard shortcuts, thus the lack of buttons. If you're not familiar with the keyboard shortcuts of FireFox, you can alternatively use the ALT key to bring up the Menu Bar.


----------
1.0.1
----------
Removed some icons and tweaked some stuff that happens with Windows version of FireFox.

----------
1.0.0
----------
Initial Release
